entries: {@note Created by the {@subclassFeature Eldritch Cannon|Artificer|EFA|Artillerist|EFA|3} subclass feature.}

actionEntries.name: Activate Cannon (Requires You to be within 60 Feet of the Cannon)
entries: As a {@variantrule Bonus Action|XPHB}, you order the cannon to use the Flamethrower, Force Ballista, or Protector option below; you can direct the cannon to move up to 15 feet before or after that option:

items.name: Flamethrower
entries: The cannon blasts fire in a 15-foot {@variantrule Cone [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Cone}. Each creature in that area makes a Dexterity saving throw against {@dcYourSpellSave}, taking {@damage 2d8} Fire damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one. Flammable objects in the {@variantrule Cone [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Cone} that aren't being worn or carried start burning.

items.name: Force Ballista
entries: Make a ranged spell attack originating from the cannon at one creature or object within 120 feet of it. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 2d8} Force damage, and if the target is a creature, it is pushed up to 5 feet away from the cannon.

items.name: Protector
entries: The cannon emits a burst of positive energy that grants itself and each creature of your choice within 10 feet of the cannon a number of {@variantrule Temporary Hit Points|XPHB} equal to {@dice 1d8} plus your Intelligence modifier (minimum of +1).
